i1.name: Perseverance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Garen''' {{sti|healing|restores|link=true}}{{ft|{{as|{{pp2|key=%|1.5+0.2*(x-1) for 6;then + 0.8*x for 7; then + 0.4*x|formula=1.3%+0.2% per level up to level 6, then+0.8% up to level 13, then+0.4%}} of his '''maximum''' health}} every 5 seconds|{{as|{{pp2|key=%|(1.5+0.2*(x-1))/10 for 6;then + 0.8/10*x for 7; then + 0.4/10*x|formula=0.13%+0.02% per level up to level 6, then+0.08% up to level 13, then+0.04%}} of his '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds}}.

''Perseverance'' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} for {{tt|7 seconds|this is not a cooldown and thus can not be reduced by cooldown reduction}} if '''Garen''' takes damage from epic {{tip|monster|monsters}}, {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or {{tip|champion|champions}}, or if he is hit by an enemy [[Champion ability|ability]].

q1.name: Decisive Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a few seconds.

Additionally, '''Garen's''' next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|4.5}} seconds {{tip|lunge|lunges}} him towards the target, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|silence|silencing}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Decisive Strike'' does not interrupt ''Garen's'' previous orders.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage does not).
** The bonus damage will also apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage is applied to structures.
* If the {{tip|slow}} has a {{tip|cripple}} effect within it, it will also be removed together with the ''slow''.
** For example, it will remove {{tip|cripple}} from {{cai|Wither|Nasus}}, but not from {{cai|Ground Slam|Malphite}}.
** ''Decisive Strike'' will remove {{tip|slow}} from {{si|Exhaust}}, but not the damage reduction, for it being two separate effects within one summoner spell.
** It will remove the slow from {{bi|Crest of Cinders|Red Buff}}, but not the damage over time.
* ''Decisive Strike'' does not protect ''Garen'' from re-application of {{tip|slow|slows}} on him.
** [[Area of effect]] {{tip|slow|slows}} (like {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) are re-applied immediately after removing if ''Garen'' stays in the corresponding area.
* Garen can {{tip|lunge}} over very thin terrain if he attacks with a fully charged {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
** {{Pending for test}} : Can he go through very thin terrain without it?

w1.name: Courage
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Garen''' permanently gains {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 '''bonus''' resistances at 120 unit kills.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' reduces incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Garen''' is additionally {{sti|shield|shielded|link=true}} for {{as|10% of his '''maximum''' health}} and gains 60% {{sti|tenacity|link=true}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Courage'' does not interrupt '''Garen's''' previous orders.
* ''Courage's'' bonus resistances are only gained when it is ranked up at least once, but ''Courage's'' passive is retroactive.
* Any enemy unit counts towards ''Courage's'' bonus resistances: champions, minions, monsters (including epic ones), [[Champion summoned units|summoned units]] and turrets. The bonus is equal in all these cases.
* ''Courage'' will only grant bonus resistances from units killed by '''Garen''' himself. {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}} of allies do not count.

e1.name: Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and rapidly {{ct|channel|spins|attack=false|cast=[[File:Decisive_Strike.png|20px|link=Garen#Decisive_Strike]] [[Garen#Decisive_Strike|Decisive Strike]] and [[File:Courage.png|20px|link=Garen#Courage]] [[Garen#Courage|Courage]] are usable. [[File:Demacian_Justice.png|20px|link=Garen#Demacian_Justice]] [[Garen#Demacian_Justice|Demacian Justice]] interrupts.|move=true|items=true|consume=true|spells=true,true,true,false,true|interrupts=death}} his sword around his body {{as|{{pp2|key1=%|type='''bonus''' attack speed|6+x;...;∞|(25*x)-25;...;∞|formula=7{{plus}}1 per 25% '''bonus''' attack speed. ''The amount of spins updates every 25% attack speed. This only considers permanent attack speed from [[item]]s and [[growth|growth (per level)]].''}}|as}} times over 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each spin to nearby enemies. ''Judgment'' can {{tip|critical strike|{{as|critically strike}}}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.

The nearest enemy is dealt 25% '''bonus''' damage per spin. Enemy champions hit 6 times have their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor reduced by 25%}}}} for 6 seconds. Hits after the 6th refresh the duration of the debuff.
After 1 second, '''Garen''' can reactivate to cancel it immediately, reducing its {{sti|cooldown}} by its remaining duration.
e1.notes:
* Each spin triggers a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* Silencing ''Garen'' will prevent him from deactivating the ability early.
* ''Judgment'' cancels ''Garen's'' last movement command upon ending.
* Each spin deals damage simultaneously to all enemies within its range when the spin is completed.
* The spin animation is capped at once per {{fd|0.2}} seconds, but the amount of ticks will keep on scaling.
* The armor reduction stacks multiplicatively with other percentage armor penetration effects.

r1.name: Demacian Justice
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' gains {{tip|true sight}} of the target champion for 1 second, dealing them {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} after a {{fd|0.5}} second delay.
r1.notes:
* ''Demacian Justice'' is cancelled and does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} under the following circumstances:
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
** The target leaves {{tip|sight}} [[range]] while '''Garen''' is {{tip|nearsight|nearsighted}}.
** The target is [[kill|killed]].
* '''Garen''' can {{si|Flash}} during the cast time without cancelling the ability.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • True Damage: (+ % of target's missing health)
